title: ProfitQuest
description: Collaborated with GreenHill Investment Reporting, Inc. alongside several Drexel students to produce an application designed for financial advisors to compete in simulated trading of financial instruments.
details: Architected the application's data model due to significant experience at Nasdaq, including schema design
Implemented data ingest from the Polygon.io API as a scheduled microservice using Spring Boot
Engineered the data translation layer from Polygon.io API response to ProfitQuest entity
Built the core game loop, including leaderboard refresh and portfolio updates as prices change
Hardened the cloud security ruleset to enforce internal ProfitQuest service isolation
Deployed the application and PostgreSQL database to Azure
